name: Shapes (itch) (PlatinumNinja72)
description: This is the first game I have made. So don't expect the best game ever, the game contains 4 levels. The aim of the game is to collect all of the beeds and progress to the next level. Simple as that! At the end you have to doge a 4-point for 10 seconds by jumping and moving. If you are expecting a long great game please DON'T buy this game.
